text.tspan: Female labor force participation rates, 2016 vs 1980
Shown is the labor force participation rate for women in 2016 (horizontal axis) and in 1980 (vertical axis). The female
labor force participation rate corresponds to the proportion of the female population ages 15 and older that is
economically active. All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections (see limitations and
Female labor force participation rate in 2016 (%) in 2016
Female labor force participation rate in 1980 (%)
